markdown:
Site-visit to KOPRIS
====================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Jan 17, 2017 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

![photo958186214688663477](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/photo958186214688663477.jpg)

Our members, Prof. Dr Mazlina and Dr Adib, have visited Koperasi Pekebun Kecil Wilayah Johor Selatan Berhad (KOPRIS) to discuss issues in their livestock industry.

![photo958186214688663505](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/photo958186214688663505.jpg)

This is the first step for this project, in order to clarify the main problems and to collect information on the target location for the project implementation.
